title: New BSD Machine! Yay!
author: ~brendantcc
content: A new BSD machine is available for all to access at bsd.tilde.team. Don't bother punching that into a web browser just yet, as ben hasn't set up the web server side of things. However, you can ssh in normally as if you were ssh'ing into tilde.team. Enjoy, and thanks to ~ben, and anyone else involved in for getting it set up for us civilians. :)
